ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] VP
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, I mean for 20-30 pple raid, need all to be 60?
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, I mean for 20-30 pple raid, need all to be 60?

On 17 January, 2001 11:32 AM, Alex Tan [SMTP:atan@...] wrote:
> I would say lvl 60??
>
> Its damn tough in VP and there is no point for you to go in at your earlier
> age....
> As every single mob there is as tough as Naggy/Vox
>
> So I would say we should pass it and camping XP and other loots (if
> possible) at the same time.
>
> I think normally guildies will be able to help you on keys..... It happend
> in Divine Grace tho.
>
> Tiffa Dancinsword
> Lvl 55 Beguiler from Divine Grace
> Erolissi Marrs
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "K W Lee" <kw.lee@...>
> To: "'* Singapore EQ Mailing List'" <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2001 9:36 AM
> Subject: [sg-everquest] VP
>
>
> > Wat's the min lvl for VP ah?
> >
> > According to Higo, any char below 55 (or he mean 55 and below, pls
> clarify)
> > will not get any trakky tooth (regardless if he helps in the raid or not,
> > often or once in a blue moon).
> >
> > In that case does it mean those 55 and below shld spend our time lvling
> > instead of joining raids at the mean time?
> >
> > Say if later all high 50 and 60 got the keys while we (the lowbies)
> lvling,
> > will we get help from guild/alliance later when we reach tat kinda lvl?
> (eg
> > guess no event to get HS keys nowadays for those who can hunt there now).
> >
> > Zil.
> >
> >
> > Singapore Everquest Players List
>
>
> Singapore Everquest Players List
